org.princehouse.mica.base.model
Interface Protocol

All Known Implementing Classes:
Aggregator, BaseProtocol, CTRWPeerSampler, CTRWSamplerOverlay, MergeCorrelated, MergeGeneric, MergeIndependent, MinAddressLeaderElection, SpanningTreeOverlay
public interface Protocol

Don't use this directly. Extend BaseProtocol to implement your own protocols.

Method Detail

getRuntimeState

RuntimeState getRuntimeState()
RuntimeState is location-specific state that is independent of the protocol instance. This includes the runtime clock and random number generator.

Returns:
Local node's runtime state.
